dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT qospav.OD_OB_SPA_ID, qospav.OD_SC_REGION, qospav.OD_PB_COMPANY, qospav.OD_PB_SERVICE_LOCATION, qospav.OD_PB_TECH_RPT_NUM, qospav.OD_PB_DIVISION, qospav.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME, qospav.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME, qospav.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL, qospav.OD_PB_CONTACT_EMAIL, qospav.OD_OB_REF_CAPID, qospav.OD_PB_DATE_CORR_IMPL, qospav.OD_PB_COMMENTS, qospav.OD_PB_ATTACHMENT, qospav.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC, qospav.OD_SC_COMPLETE_BY_START_DATE, qospav.OD_SC_COMPLETE_BY_END_DATE, qospav.OD_PB_FQA_REQUESTER, qospav.OD_PB_CAP_YN, qospav.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM, qospav.OD_PB_CASE_NUMBER, qospav.OD_OB_INSPECTOR, qospav.OD_PB_AUDIT_TYPE, qospav.OD_OB_SPA_STATUS, qospav.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME, qospav.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME, qospav.OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS, qospav.OD_PB_PO_NUM, qospav.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC, qospav.OD_OB_SKU FROM Q_OD_OB_SPA_V qospav WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(qospav.OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION, NVL(qospav.OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_AUDITOR_NAME,NVL(qospav.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_PB_COMPANY,'X') = NVL(:P_COMPANY_AUDITED, NVL(qospav.OD_PB_COMPANY,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_PB_SERVICE_LOCATION,'X') = NVL(:P_SP_LOCATION, NVL(qospav.OD_PB_SERVICE_LOCATION,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_OB_INSPECTOR,'X') = NVL(:P_INSPECTOR, NVL(qospav.OD_OB_INSPECTOR,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_PB_AUDIT_TYPE,'X') = NVL(:P_AUDIT_TYPE, NVL(qospav.OD_PB_AUDIT_TYPE,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_OB_SPA_STATUS,'X') = NVL(:P_STATUS, NVL(qospav.OD_OB_SPA_STATUS,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME, NVL(qospav.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME, NVL(qospav.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_PB_DIVISION,'X') = NVL(:P_DIVISION, NVL(qospav.OD_PB_DIVISION,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT, NVL(qospav.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_PB_FQA_REQUESTER,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER, NVL(qospav.OD_PB_FQA_REQUESTER,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER, NVL(qospav.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) AND NVL(qospav.OD_PB_CAP_YN,'X') = NVL(:P_CAP, NVL(qospav.OD_PB_CAP_YN,'X')) ORDER BY OD_OB_SPA_ID
